name: teemingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is full of something, or has a lot of a certain quality: These tiny mites are teemingly numerous on rocky shores. The bar is a teemingly trendy place, right in the middle of town.
More examplesFewer examplesHe lived in the city when it had a teemingly rich scene filled with poets, artists, writers, and coffee shops. Healthy soil is mostly an unstudied and unknown area, but teemingly alive.
